FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE SENATE AND THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONSTITUTE THEMSELVES INTO A CONSTITUENT ASSEMBLY TO PROPOSE A REVISION OF THE 1987 CONSTITUTION
